titleStmt.title: A letter of addresse to the Protector occasioned by Mr. Needhams reply to Mr. Goodwins book against the triers. By a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: D. F.
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

notesStmt.note: A defense of John Goodwin's "Basanistai" against: Nedham, Marchamont. The great accuser cast down.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
